Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
31.01.2013 JH SCR17916 Changed locate on ARCH selection
08.10.2012 JH SCR17529 Added GB324 File encoding
-- Get initial directory
... select importfile via file dialogue
-- Import file is selected, start further handling
Change imported file to UTF-8
... delete temp table
... only if at least one barcode could be extracted, and a row eixts in ARCH for
every extracted barcoede, store HYPB rows
... show list with missing archive rows outside the current transaction
-- Extract barcodes orm file (sign ^ = chr(94))
@The barcode has to be extracted between the 6. ^^ pair, so the module
first removes all characters until the 11. ^ and extrated the barcode from
the remaing string until the next ^
... extract barcode from remaining string
... first remove all characters until the 11. ^ character
@The barcode has to be extracted between the 6. ^^ pair, so the module
first removes all characters until the 11. ^ and extrated the barcode from
the remaing string until the next ^
... extract path/file PDF from remaining string
... first remove all characters until the 13. ^ character
... write existing barcodes to file, if all barcodes exists, in a second step
the necessary HYPB are stored
... write not existing barcodes to file, are presented on screen outside the
current transaction
... update HYPB_HYPA_ID
... store PDF to Radiant archive
-- In case of problems with archiving the PDF, the whole task will be aborted
